name: Face-detection-using-opencv
tagline: A simple program written in C++ to detect human faces using opencv.
body:
### Face detection using opencv
From here, you can download the source-code as tar or zip file. Also you can check the code on the git-repository as well. To clone this code, follow this:

```
$ cd any_directory_you_want
$ git clone https://github.com/aman2467/Face-detection-using-opencv.git
```

### Other repositories
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
